snippet: Senator Bernie Sanders often says that he has no “super PAC” supporting his candidacy and he has vigorously tried to keep any from forming. But he has been getting some unsolicited if mischievous help from Republican groups.
abstract: Senator Bernie Sanders often says that he has no “super PAC” supporting his candidacy and he has vigorously tried to keep any from forming. But he has been getting some unsolicited if mischievous help from Republican groups.

headline.main: Bernie Sanders Gets Some Outside Help He Didn’t Ask For
